titleStmt.title: A mission of consolation. Usefull for all afflicted persons. / By W.S.
titleStmt.author: Slingsby, William, fl. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.B. for John Williams, and are to be sold at the sign of the Crown, in Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: W.S. expanded to S'lingsby"; "Aprill. 4.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Crown, in Paul's Church-yard.
